canHover() - Method in class TicTac4.Piece
Used to call the highlighting method of the parent panel

This function is used to change the color of a Piece
checkWinners() - Method in class TicTac4.BigBoard
This function is to check the winners matrix, seeing if there is a Tic-Tac-Toe winner or if the game is a tie.
close_dialog(String) - Method in class TicTac4.BigBoard
Used to show a JOptionPane asking whether or not the user wants to exit the game.
